prompts: Create a legendary Pokemon that controls storms and has a bold blue and black color scheme.
I want a mythical creature with a powerful electric aura and unique bird-like features.
Generate an electric-type Pokemon that resembles a thundercloud with striking purple accents.
Make a Pokemon with a twisted tail and a fierce expression, embodying the spirit of lightning.
Imagine a powerful creature capable of summoning storms, featuring vibrant colors and winged design.
Design a Pokemon that floats above the ground, with a sleek body and a mischievous personality.
Show me a Pokemon that blends elements of thunder and wind, with an imposing presence.
